docs.title: Pipeline
docs.text:
.ci-git.yml
# Define Stages
stages:
- build
- test
- deploy
# Define { build } stage jobs
build:
stage: build
script:
- echo "Build"
# Define { test } stage jobs
unit_tests:
stage: test
script:
- echo "Unit-Tests"
integration_tests:
stage: test
script:
- echo "Integration-Tests"
# Define { deploy } stage jobs
deploy_to_staging:
stage: deploy
script:
- echo "Deploy-To-Staging"
deploy_to_production:
stage: deploy
script:
- echo "Deploy-To-Production"
